definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
to go on the rampage/to riot/to run amuck
to overflow/transverse flow/to flow over/cross flow

sentences.english: The first division of the zygote is transverse. The embryogeny belongs to the Onagrd type.
sentences.chinese: 合子第一次分裂为横分裂，胚的发育属柳叶菜型。

sentences.english: This can be done through adjusting the length of the tie rod.
sentences.chinese: 调节前束可以通过调节横拉杆的长度来进行。

sentences.english: Clearly he saw a T-crossing, lying in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 他清清楚楚地看见一条丁字街，横在他眼前。

sentences.english: House: Only an idiot gets between Ahab and his whale.
sentences.chinese: 唯有傻子才会横在亚哈和白鲸之间。

sentences.english: The system algorithm is designed for pipeline's cross and lengthwise section.
sentences.chinese: 算法设计是为解决管线的横纵剖面图而设计的。

sentences.english: Take the first turning on the right and then ask again.
sentences.chinese: 到第一横马路往右拐，然后再问一下。

sentences.english: A century's enmity and countless deaths stand between us and the Hun.
sentences.chinese: 一个世纪的仇恨，无数的死亡横在我们及破坏者之间。

sentences.english: He was cold after his twenty blocks' walk.
sentences.chinese: 走过了二十条横马路，他感到冷了。

sentences.english: If you find that you’d rather be plugged in then that’s okay too!
sentences.chinese: 如果你发现你更喜欢置身其中，那也横好。

sentences.english: A melancholy fold, which resembled the beginning of irony, wrinkled her right cheek.
sentences.chinese: 一条含愁的皱痕横在她的右脸上，仿佛是冷笑的起始。

sentences.english: A transversely cantilevered setting method was applied for its arch ring construction.
sentences.chinese: 横悬挑的设置方法被应用其拱圈施工。

sentences.english: The transversal momentum behavior of the longitudinal structure function of the nucleon is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了核子的纵向结构函数的横动量行为。

sentences.english: He saw clearly a T-street to across before him.
sentences.chinese: 他清清楚楚地看见一条丁字街，横在他眼前。

sentences.english: The train stopped because there was a tree across the track.
sentences.chinese: 火车停了，因为火车轨道上横着一棵树。

sentences.english: The article has introduced the cross wedge rolling preforming technology and its die design.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了楔横轧制坯工艺及其模具设计。

sentences.english: The brush goes to coordinate with the horizontal and the vertical on purpose.
sentences.chinese: 笔扫纵横，有意配合横与直之构成。

definition: to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)
to hit/to strike/to tap/to rap/to knock/to rip sb off/to overcharge
left/the left side/to the left of
be high up in the sky
to cross over/to transcend/to cover distance/to overcome/to rise above
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
to throw/to cast/left-slanting downward brush stroke (calligraphy)
